attributes.action: Ban all smoking in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the new smoking ban coming in on the 2nd April will ban smoking in enclosed public areas, children, family members and non-smokers on the street are not protected by this law so second-hand smoking will still affect them. We petition the P.M. to make a total ban on smoking tobacco everywhere in the UK, including in homes and on the street

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
